string-array.name: theQuestions
string-array.item: Need vs Want. Swipe out items you think that does not belong to your NEED list item.
Swipe out items that you thought you wont get a lot of use out of it
Do you really need it? For a long term use? Swipe items that arent
If someone offered you the cash exact value instead of the item, which item will it be?
Which item you think you CAN live even without it? Swipe it out
Does your daily routine need it? If not, swipe it out
Promotional sales? If you think cant afford it at full price, maybe its time to swipe it out.
